title: ‘We Are Not the First Team to Be Slapped Around by Pogačar’: Ineos Grenadiers Stung at Giro d’Italia
content:
'Rome is still far away': Ineos Grenadiers not giving up as TT losses sting despite putting three into the top-4.

Read the full article at ‘We Are Not the First Team to Be Slapped Around by Pogačar’: Ineos Grenadiers Stung at Giro d’Italia on Velo.
author: ahood
